org.apache.river.test.spec.renewalservice

Class LeaseRenewalServiceTestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.spec.renewalservice.LeaseRenewalServiceTestUtil

  • public class LeaseRenewalServiceTestUtil
extends Object
    This class provides methods to perform often used convenience routines. Helps make testing code more reliable, robust and (sometimes) easier to read.

    • Field Summary

        Returns:

        A convenience method to convert an expiration time to an duration. Note: this method can return a negative number.
        Parameters:
        expiration - the expiration time to be converted
        Returns:
        expiration - System.currentTimeMillis()

      • isValidExpWarnEventReg

        public boolean isValidExpWarnEventReg(net.jini.core.event.EventRegistration evReg,
                                      net.jini.lease.LeaseRenewalSet lrSet)
                               throws TestException
        A convenience method to validate an EventRegistration object for ExpirationWarningEvents.

        Notes:

        Parameters:
        evReg - an EventRegistration object whose validity is tested.
        lrSet - a renewal set which is the expected source of this event registration.
        Returns:
        true if the event registration is valid; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        TestException

      • isValidEventReg

        protected boolean isValidEventReg(net.jini.core.event.EventRegistration evReg,
                                  net.jini.lease.LeaseRenewalSet lrSet,
                                  long evID)
                           throws TestException
        A method to generally check the validity of an EventRegistration.

        Notes:

        Parameters:
        evReg - an EventRegistration object whose validity is tested.
        lrSet - a renewal set which is the expected source of this event registration.
        evID - the expected event id.
        Returns:
        true if the event registration is valid; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        TestException - if a configuration error occurs while preparing the renewal set

                         String reason)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Sleep for the specified duration and print out a reason for the call to sleep.
        Parameters:
        duration - the number of milliseconds to sleep
        reason - the String that is the reason for the call to sleep
        Throws:
        InterruptException - If another thread calls interrupt on this Thread.

      • waitForLeaseExpiration

        protected boolean waitForLeaseExpiration(net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease,
                                         String reason)
                                  throws net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException,
                                         RemoteException,
                                         InterruptedException
        This method determines how the renewal set lease is canceled.

        Notes:

        This method is sort of a template method to support reuse of test code.
        Parameters:
        lease - the lease whose expiration is waited for
        reason - a String representing the reason for waiting
        Returns:
        true if lease is expired, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        RemoteException
        InterruptedException

      • createRemoteEventWaitThread

        public Thread createRemoteEventWaitThread(RememberingRemoteListener listnr,
                                          long numberOfEvents)
        Returns a running Thread that is waiting until the event count of the RememberingRemoteListener reaches at least numberOfEvents.

        Notes:
        The start() method has already been called on the returned thread.
        Also, the return decision is based soley on the current internal count of the number of events received. So, for example, if the RememberingRemoteListener has already received 2 events and this method is called with value of 2 or less, then the Thread will exit immediatelty from its run method.

        Parameters:
        listnr - the RemoteListener to wait on
        numberOfEvents - the lower bound event count target
        Returns:
        a running thread that is waiting for the event count of the RememberingRemoteListener to reach at least numberOfEvents.

      • waitForRemoteEvents

        public boolean waitForRemoteEvents(RememberingRemoteListener listnr,
                                   long numberOfEvents,
                                   long timeOutInMillis)
                            throws InterruptedException
        Wait on a RememberingRemoteListener for its event count to go to at least numberOfEvents.

        Notes:

        Parameters:
        listnr - the RemoteListener to wait on
        numberOfEvents - the number of events to wait for
        timeOutInMillis - the number of milliseconds to wait before timing out
        Returns:
        true if all events were received, false if timeout occurred
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • indexOfLease

        public int indexOfLease(net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease,
                        net.jini.core.lease.Lease[] array)
        Helper method to determine if a lease is in an array.
        Parameters:
        lease - the Lease whose index is sought in the array
        array - the array containing leases to be searched
        Returns:
        the index in array where lease is found or -1 if not found.

      • indexOfLease

                        MarshalledObject[] array)
                 throws IOException,
                        ClassNotFoundException
        Helper method to determine if a marshalled lease is in an array.
        Parameters:
        lease - the Lease whose marshalled object index is sought in the array
        array - the array containing marshalled objects for search
        Returns:
        the index in array where lease is found or -1 if not found.
